english.title: Leave You? No
text: Where to can you escape from the one who loves you
And is ready, for your sake,
to sell himself, because he wishes
to be by your side; enough separation!
Darling, I swear I won't leave you
Even if countries stand between us
I will cross them
And I'll overdo it
It's not something I'm utterly stubborn about
Leave you? no
I cannot leave you
I'd go around the whole world for the sake of your eyes
I would walk through fire to get you
Oh just who could make me reach you?
Where to can you escape from the one who loves you
And is ready, for your sake,
to sell himself, because he wishes
to be by your side; enough separation!
This is a waste of time
I swear on your life
It is a shame if we are separated for even a day
Get to the point
This is after all
nonsense
that is totally unneeded
I have nothing else to do
other than waiting to see you one day
If I [must] describe it to you
or swear it to you
The whole world is one thing
And you are totally something else to me

text: WHERE WOULD U GO FROM THE PERSON U LOVE AND FOR U HE IS CAPable
OF SELLING HIMSELF BECAUSE HE WISH HE IS NEXT TO U ENOUGH OF BEING FAR
MY LOVE, I SWEAR I WONT LET U GO EVEN IF THERE IS COUNTRYS BETWEEN U AND ME
I WOULD GO THROUGH IT AND DRIVE IT, ENOUGH I AM GOING TO BE STUBBORN
I WONT LEAVE U, I CANT LEAVE U I WILL TRAVEL THE WORLD BECAUSE OF YOUR EYES
I WILL STEP IN A FIRE JUST TO GET U WHO COULD LEAD ME TO U
I SWEAR TO U ITS A WASTE OF TIME ITS A PITY BEING AWAY FROM EACH OTHER EVEN A DAY
START FROM THE END THE END ARE WORDS THAT DONT MEAN ANYTHING THEY ARE NOT NEEDED
I DONT HAVE ANYTHING TO DO BUT WAIT TO SEE U ONE DAY

arabic.title: أمانة عليك
text: وألنبي يا حبيبي امانه عليك
لو كنت في يوم زعلان مني
لو شفتني وسط الناس بعينيك
سلم وناديني وكلمني
الناس واخدين بالهم منك
وبيعرفو حالك ويايا
وبيسألوا دايما على قلبك
أحسن يعرفوا كده حكايه
وانا هرضى بأي كلام منك
برضاك او كان غصب عنك
وانشالله يكون من ورا قلبك
وبلاش قدامهم تجرحني
انت ما تعرفش بيعملوا ايه
وخصامنا بيعمل فيهم ايه
على قد ما تقدر ابقى داري
وانا عارف انك مخاصمني
الناس واخدين بالهم منك
وبيعرفو حالك ويايا
وبيسألوا دايما على قلبك
أحسن يعرفوا كده حكايه

english.title: I Beg You
text: Swear to me baby, I beg you
If some day you are upset with me
If you saw me among the people
Say hello, call me over and talk to me
The people are taking good care of you
And they know your situation with me
They constantly ask about your heart
It's better they know you've become a story
And I am okay with anything you say
I will satisfy you even if it's against your will
And I hope that it's behind your heart
Please don't hurt me in front of them
You don't know what they are doing
Or what our fight/argument is doing to them
As much as you can try and conceal it
And I know you're not speaking to me
The people are taking good care of you
And they know your situation with me
They constantly ask about your heart
It's better they know you've become a story

arabic.title: اجمل قصه حب
text: اجمل قصة حب عايشها
معاك فى هواك
احلى كلام م القلب بيطلع
وانا وياك فى لقاك
بسيب عينى تقول لعينك
كلام حاسه وشايفه انا فيك
واتوه لما تقول كلمة
بحب اسمعاها انا بين ايديك
قبل ما اقول الكلمة
تقولها بصوت يا حياتى
نفسي اعيشلك عمرى
وكل دقيقة فى حياتى
واشتاق دايما اقولك
احلى كلام يا سلام
لو يوصلك قبل ما اقوله
بعينى اوام يا سلام

english.title: Bahebak Wahashtini بحبك وحشتيني
text: I love you, I miss you
I'm sorry that it's late
I have nothing but you
Oh light of my eye
And you have a lot of things to say to me
Because my heart is trying to satisfy you
And you don't let your love show the way
Without you life is cold
And much remains of it
Maybe sometimes you miss some things
That are very simple and easy
But I get very angry at you forget them
Don't forget to speak I beg you
For the sake of everyone that loves you
My eyes, my heart, and my years
Are forgotten, wanting you
Help me and say it please
Because sometimes it hurts
I'll find for you the things I have
And tell them to my heart

english.title: The Most Beautiful Love Story
text: I'm living the most beautiful love story with you .. In your love
The sweetest words come out from the heart when I'm with you .. Meeting you
I let my eye tell yours, words that I feel and see in your eyes
And I get lost when you say a word that I love to hear in your arms
Before I say the word you say it in my voice, my life
Nefsy A3eshlak 3omry We Kol de2e2a fe 7aiaty I wish to live my life and every minute of it for you
And to miss to tell you the sweetests words, how sweet would it be
If it reaches you before I say it with my eyes right away, how sweet!!
I let my eye tell yours, words that I feel and see in your eyes
And I get lost when you say a word that I love to hear in your arms

english.title: Agmal 2esset 7ob
text: The most beautiful love story is the one I have with you.. with your love
The sweetest words ever said are the ones I say when I'm next to you.. in your presence
I leave my eyes to do the talking when I look into your eyes.. they say what I feel and see in you
And I'm lost when I hear the words "I love" from you while I'm in your arms
Before I say a word you say it first, my darling
It's my wish to live every minute in my life for you, my darling
And I miss always telling you the sweetest words, oh wow
If these words reach you before I give you a look from my eyes, oh wow

arabic.title: امبارح
text: امبارح كان لسه معايا .. وبيحلم بيا وبهوايا
كنت امشي كان يجرى ورايا .. ويقوللى ما تستنى شوية
امبارح مين بس يشوفه .. من شوقو ليا ومن خوفه
كان واقف بيدارى كسوفه .. مش عارف يتقرب ليا
وحلفلى وقاللى انا مشغول .. صدقته زى ما بيقول
دلوقتى كان ليه صدقته مع انه ده مكانش يطول
كان خايف لكن طمنته .. ولا عمرى مرة ماخونته
على قلبى وحياتو آمنته ونسينى و اوام اتغير
مش فارقة اهو حب وعدى .. ومحدش بيموت من الوحدة
دة لقانا كان يوم واتقضى .. وهوانا كان عمره قصير

english.title: Yesterday
text: yesterday she was just with me
and dreaming of me and meeting me
I used to leave, she used to run after me
and tell me "please stay for a while"
yesterday, who could've seen her
of her longing to me and her fear
she was standing hiding her shyness
she couldn't come over to me
yesterday she was just with me
and dreaming of me and meeting me
I used to leave, she used to run after me
and tell me "please stay for a while"
and she swore to me that she was busy
I believed what she said
now why did I believe her
although she wouldn't have dreamed of having someone like me
yesterday she was just with me
and dreaming of me and meeting me
I used to leave, she used to run after me
and tell me "please stay for a while"
She was scared, but I calmed her
and I've never doubted her
i trusted her with my heart and life
then she forgot me and suddenly changed
it doesn't matter, it's a love that passed
and no one dies of loneliness
out meeting was a day that was spent
and our love had a short life
She was scared, but I calmed her
and I've never doubted her
i trusted her with my heart and life
then she forgot me and suddenly changed
and she swore to me that she was busy
I believed what she said
now why did I believe her
although she wouldn't have dreamed of having someone like me
yesterday she was just with me
and dreaming of me and meeting me
I used to leave, she used to run after me
and tell me "please stay for a while"

english.title: Beware
text: Do not think of going away and forgetting me
That thought worries me
My heart is not easy for you to deal with
Yet don’t go leaving me.
Blame me, try me
I cannot live apart from you
You did not tell me when you would be back, darling
Do not start to part, for there is so much I have done
Who (else) is there? And tomorrow, you will now, my darling
That my feelings for you have never in my life subsided
Do not think of getting away from me some day
Do you want to lose me?
Do you want me to get lost, away from you?
I will be at ease once you listen to me
Well, is it so bad
If I am weak in your hands?

english.title: You Know
text: You know if your heart was left for me what I would do?
Tell me, I wont tell you what I'll do, you will feel it
The important thing is that all that you dream and hope for
Between your arms, in your eyes you will find it
And I bet you the world that there are no feelings in the people's hearts like those of mine
Rest assured beside me, go crazy, love me and look into my eyes
When I blink I find that I miss you in that moment, you own me
When someone loves you like that are you cruel to them or will you love him back?
For one to find a love like this why would she try and lose it? (or will you love me)
And I bet you the world that there are no feelings in the people's hearts like those of mine
You know if your heart was left for me what I would do?
Tell me, I wont tell you what I'll do, you will feel it
The important thing is that all that you dream and hope for
Between your arms, in your eyes you will find it

arabic.title: تعيشي معايا
text: تعيشي معايا في الجنه تمليها
وتخرجي منها بارادتك ونتفارق
وتكدبي كدبه في خيالك تعيشيها
وتعملي اني مش فارق
وانا افارق
وترجعي تاني بعد البعد ما يهدك
ويضعف قلبي
من الدمعه اللي علي خدك
وكالعاده تقولي وانتي حضناني
انا اسفه ومش هعمل كده تاني
وترجعي تاني نتفارق وبسذاجه
تروحي لسكه النسيان وتمشيها
وتشغلي وقتك الفاضي بكام حاجه
دواير عايشه طول عمرك تلفيها
لكن المره دي غير كل اللي قبليها
لقيت نفسي خلاص
وارتاحت في غيابك
ومن كتر الحاجات اللي عملتيها
ادي اللي انتي كتير سبتي
خلاص قلبي
مترجعليش ومهما البعد هيهدك
خلاص مش فارقه كام دمعه علي خدك
هقولهالك عشان البعد قساني
انا اسف ومش هعمل كده تاني

english.title: You live with me
text: You live with me in paradise, but get bored
You leave it with your own will and we part
You lie in your mind and believe your lie
Pretending I make no difference to you, while I do make
Then you come back to me after being apart tears you down
And I feel weak before you seeing those tears on your cheeks
And as usual, you tell me while you hug me, "Sorry, I will never do that again"
Then we part again and so naively, you go down oblivion path and follow it
And try to fill your empty time with anything,
the same vicious circles you keep going through
Then you come back to me after being apart tears you down
And I feel weak before you seeing those tears on your cheeks
And as usual, you tell me while you hug me, "Sorry, I will never do that again"
But this time is different from all time before,
I am at peace with myself and felt at ease in your absence
And because of all the things you did
the guy you once left, now leaves you
Don't come back to me and no matter how hard being apart on you
Those tears on your cheek don't make a difference to me anymore
Here I am telling you because your staying away made my heart hard
"I am sorry I will never do that again"

text: حلفوه لما تشوفوه بالليالي وفكروه

حب عمره ما يتنسي

لسه حبي ومش ناسيه

Whatever he says .. however cruel he could be
Tell him that he lies if he said he had forgotten
Tell him that what is between the two of us
Is an unforgettable love
Tell him that I love him
That he has my heart and soul
That I know he still remembers
And he didn't forget my love
Tell him and remind him with the nights when you see him
Try to make him come back to me

ever since the day you came and it met you

the love of my life

That you are my fate

arabic.title: زي الايام دي
text: زي الايام دي انا فاكر كنا بنتقابل ونقول ونعيد
زي الايام دي كنا منتكلم عن بكرى وكأنو بعيد
دلوقت خلاص لو حتى منتقابل صدفه منبص بعيد
موتنا حاجات عاشت فينا ويا ريت ناسيين
بنموت وبنضحك على روحنا ونقول عايشين
يظهر هنعيش اللي باقيلنا على حس يومين
لو كنت نسيتني انا فاكرك لسا ومش عارف ازاي هنساك
واللي مطمني قلبي بيحلفلي انك ليا ومحتجلي معاك
وبجد كتير بقى بعد ما عشت معاك عمري بحلم بلقاك
موتنا حاجات عاشت فينا ويا ريت ناسيين

english.title: Like These Days
text: Like these days I recall we used to meet and talk and repeat
Like these days we would speak about tomorrow (the future) as if it was a holiday
Not anymore, now if we meet by coincidence we both look away
Things living inside of us are killing us and I wish we could both forget
We die, but we laugh and try to fool ourselves into thinking we're living
Seems we will live what is left of us within two days
If you forgot me, I remember you, I still don't know how I will forget you
And what reassures me is my heart that swears you are mine and you need me with you
Seriously, after I have lived with you I will never dream of your return
Things living inside of us are killing us and I wish we could both forget
We die, but we laugh and try to fool ourselves into thinking we're living
Seems we will live what is left of us within two days

text: شايف نفسي فيك
وشايف بكره بعيشه ليك
وعارف مهما هشوف كتير واصادف
هفضل بين ايديك حبيبي
كنت عليك سنين بنادي
وانا دلوقتي ليك وراضي
بفرح لو تكون قصادي
وارتاح لما اقول حبيبي
...حبيبي
ياما رسملي فيك خيالي
كنت بحس بيك ليالي
وبقابلك كتير في بالي
وبقول امتي اشوف حبيبي
عمري بين ايديك
ناديته
والوقت اللي فات نسيته
واللي انا نفسي فيه لقيته
لما بقيت معاه
...حبيبي

english.title: I See Myself in You
text: I see myself in you
And I see myself living my coming days for you
And I know that no matter how much I see or encounter1
I will remain all yours, my love
I was calling for you for years
And now I am yours and content with that
I am happy when you stand before me
And become relieved when I say: my love..
My love...
My imagination has drawn a picture of you for so long
I used to sense you for nights
And meet you so much in my mind
And say when will I meet my love?
My life is in your hands
I called it
And I've forgotten the time that has passed
And I've found what I was wishing for
When I became with her
My love...

arabic.title: شريط حياتي
text: فى ناس بتجرح ناس
وناس تشيل فى عيونها ناس
وناس قلوبها من الاساس حجر مايلين
مشيت فى طريق طويل
كان اى حلم قصادى صعب ومستحيل
كان نفسى حد يقولى والله السكة فين
وشريط حياتى بيعدى من قدام عنيا
شوفت النهاية من البداية باينه جاية
دى سنين كتير من العمر عدوا فىسؤال معرفش رده
من اللى جانى فى الحكاية ومين ضحية
فى ناس مكشوفين ورا الستاير ناس كتير مش متشافيين
وعشان نشوف لازم نشوف من الناحيتين
غلطان ولا برئ كده او كده مكنش فى فى ايديه شئ
وازاى نلوم على حد مختارش الطريق

english.title: The Tape of my Life
text: There are people who hurt other people.
And people who hold others in their hearts.
And people whose heart's core is stone, which softens not.
I walked in a long path.
Any dream I had was impossible and far away.
I always wished that someone could tell me, just once, where the path was.
The tape of my life is playing/passing in front of my eyes.
I saw the end from the start. It looked like it was coming.
Many years of life have passed. There's still a question I don't know the answer to.
Who was the bad guy in the story, and who was the victim?
There are people who were exposed & behind curtains were lots of people unseen.
And to really see, we have to see it (the story) from both sides.
Guilty or innocent, either way there was no choice in my hands
And how are we to blame someone who didn't pick his own path
The tape of my life is playing in front of my eyes.
I saw the end from the start. It was clear and coming.
Many years of life have passed. There's still a question I don't know the answer to.
Who was the bad guy in the story, and who was the victim?

english.title: The ribbon of my life
text: There are people who hurt people
And people who help others
And people whose hearts are rock that don't melt
I walked a long road
Whatever dream I had was hard and impossible to reach
I wanted someone to say, where are the (rail)roads?
And the ribbon of my life passing me before my eyes
I saw the end when I was at the beginning, it looked like it was coming.
A lot of years from the life are gone, and there is a question I do not know the answer to.
Who did wrong and who is the victim?
There are people who are exposed, a lot of people behind the curtains unseen.
And to see, you have to see both sides (of the story).
Guilty or innocent, this or that, there was nothing in my hands.
And how are we to blame someone who didn't pick his own path.

english.title: I Saw With My Own Eyes

This whole world, and your love has taken me
You are the one I had wished for
I wish that my heart is alongside yours

And more than I could have ever wished for
My life before you came and went
Now, beside you I am comfortable

We will live the most beautiful years
We're not afraid of the people or the world

We will live the most beautiful years

Stay here with me

Oh, love of my life

arabic.title: نسيت الناس
text: غرامك من زمان فيا
كلامك كلو حنية
لقتنى بسرعة خدت عليك
وجودك جنبى خلانى
اشوف الدنيا لون تانى
وضحكتلى الحياة فى عنيك
نسيت الناس معاك انت
حبيبى الدنيا وانا جنبك عليا تهون
بقينا خلاص انا وانتا لبعض
ومستحيل البعد بنا يكون
سنين من عمرنا فاتوا
محسش قلبى دقاته
غير اللحظة الى فيها لقاك
حياتى بقالها بيك معنى
اخيرا ربنا جمعنا

english.title: I Forgot The People
text: Your love was in me from long ago
Your words are all affectionate
I found myself quickly falling for you
Your presence beside me has made me
See the world in different colors
Life laughs for me in your eyes
I forgot the people when with you
Darling when I am next to you the world is so small
As if it's only you and I
For each other and it's impossible for distance to come between us
Years of our lives passed
That my heart didn't feel your beats
Until the moment he had found you
Now my life has a meaning
Finally, the Lord has united us
And the time has come for us to be together
I forgot the people when with you
Darling when I am next to you the world is so small
As if it's only you and I
For each other and it's impossible for distance to come between us

are together, and its impossible to be far away from each other

My heart hasnt felt its pulse..
only the second we met
My life now has a meaning
at last god has gathered us
And the time to be with you has came
I forgot the people with you
My love, I forget the world when your next to me
Now me and you ..
are together, and its impossible to separate

arabic.title: هنساه
text: ده عدي عليا وقت كتير
و انا مستني ترجعلي
خلاص مليت من التفكير
و قلبي عليك بيوجعني
و لو مش راجع ايه خلاه
من الاول هنا يجيني
ما كان يفضل مكانه و انا
كفيل بعده ينسيني
هنساه لو حياتي معاه
و عمره في يوم ما يوحشني
هنساه لو حياتي معاه
وعمره في يوم ما هيشوفني
في عز ما سبت روحي معاه
و عيشت في حلم يجمعنا
و هو اتاريه لا فارقه معاه
ده كان واحد بيخدعنا
وفاجاه لقيته سابني و راح
و قالي خلاص كده كفايه
ما تبعد عني و انا هرتاح
ملكش مكان هنا معايا

english.title: I will forget her
text: A lot of time has passed while I waited for you to come back, I got tired of thinking and my heart aches for you.
If she is not coming back why would she cross paths with me in the first place, she should have stayed away and the distance would be enough to make me forget.
I will forget her even If my life depends on her, I will never miss her, I will forget her even if my life depends on her and she shall never see me again.
My soul was hers for the taking as I lived a dream of us together, in the end It meant nothing to her, she was just a player.
Suddenly she just left saying that she has had enough.
Just go away, I will be okay, you are not welcomed here by my side.
I will forget her even if my life depends on her, I will never miss her, I will forget her even if my life depends on her and she shall never see me again.

arabic.title: وانا وياك

انت حكاياتي انت كل حياتي
كل دقه فقلبي رايحه وجايه من عندك

Every beat of my heart comes and goes to you
Everything in me, every beat of my heart is yours
It's hard for me to forget the passion in your eyes
Anyone who loves you can't forget you
Everything in me, every beat of my heart is yours
It's hard for me to forget the passion in your eyes

arabic.title: كل ما أغني
text: اه يا حبيبي
كل حاجة بحبها حبيتها بيك
ياه يا حبيبي
روحي ليل ونهار بتطمن عليك
كل ما بصحى كل ما اغني
كل ما يوم يعدي جديد
حبك ليا بيطمني
مهما تكون حبيبي بعيد
آه ياللي طلعت بيك م الدنيا
دنيتي اني اكون ويّاك
حتى العمر لو فيه ثانية
تبقى الثانية عمري معاك
ياه يا حبيبي
حبك هو الدنيا والناس والحياة
ياه يا حبيبي
حبك هو الحلم اللي مكمِّل معاه
كل ما بصحى كل ما اغني
كل ما يوم يعدي جديد
حبك ليا بيطمني
مهما تكون حبيبي بعيد
فيك من طبعي فيك من روحي
فيك كل اللي بتمناه
حضنك ده اللي طمِّن روحي
حضنك ده اللي بستناه

english.title: Every Time I Sing
text: Oh my love,
Everything that I love, I found it and love seeing it in you.
Oh my love,
My soul longs to look after you every day and night.
Every time I wake up and sing,
Every new day that comes,
Your love for me makes me feel save,
No matter how far you are.
Ohhh, you is what I got from this life,
My wish is to be with you,
Even if there was one second left of my life,
That one second would be all that I’ve lived for.
Oh my love,
Your love for me is the world, the people and the life I need.
Oh my love,
Your love is the dream that came true.
Every time I wake up and sing,
Every new day that comes,
Your love for me makes me feel save,
No matter how far you are.
In you I see myself and my soul,
In you I see all I ever wished for,
You holding me in your arms is what comforts me,
You holding me in your arms is what I wait for.
